name: cpuminer pro
short_description:
Cpuminer pro is an advanced cpu miner for litecoin, bitcoin, dogecoin or other cryptocurrencies based on scrypt & command line cpuminer minerd tool with GUI, supports getwork & stratum mining protocol. Can be used for both solo and pooled mining. 

Available for windows, linux, mac, ubuntu platforms. Included all dependencies (lincurl, Qt). 

Portable, no installation required. 
Documentations, manuals, Blockchain .torrent and various batch files are provided. 
Inbuilt mining pools. Mining pool status: total rewards, paid rewards, speed rate reporting and share rate counting. 

Runs minimizing to system tray in background. Restart automatically after crash. 
Save output to text file. 
Arguments and options can be set using GUI. 
Multi-threaded, scrypt  algorithm for litecoin and SHA-256d for bitcoin mining.
summary: CPU miner for Bitcoin, litecoin, dogecoin with GUI.
